Remodeling Sengoku Boost (- Button on/off) (Player Speed) [ZiT]
288A9FC2 EFFF1000
05070B4C xxxxxxxx
CC000000 00000000
05070B4C 3F800000
E0000000 80008000
xxxxxxxx = Speed
3EE00000 = Slow
3D000000 = Very Slow
00000000 = Stop
40000000 = Fast
40800000 = Very Fast

05070A8C 000000zz
1P=xx
2P=yy
Sub=zz

Player
00=Masamune Date
01=Yukimura Sanada
02=Mitsunari Ishida
03=Tokugawa Ieyasu
04=Magoichi Saika
05=Kanbe Kuroda
06=Keiji Maeda
07=Tsuruhime
08=Kotaro Fuma
09=Motochika Chosokabe
0A=Yoshitsugu Otani
0B=Yoshihiro Shimazu
0C=Oichi
0D=Motonari Mori
0E=Tadakatsu Honda
0F=Nobunaga Oda

Enemy
10=Muneshige Tachibana
11=Hideaki Kobayakawa
12=Yoshiaki Mogami
13=Tenkai
14=Kenshin Uesugi
15=Kasuga
16=Sasuke Sarutobi
17=Kojuurou Katakura

19=Toshiie Maeda
1A=Ujimasa Hojo

Arms Change

1P [ZiT]
05070A34 000000xx

2P [ZiT]
05070A38 000000xx
xx = Arms
00 = Initial
01 = One Stage
02 = Two Stages
03 = Three Stages
04 = Four Stages
05 = Five Stages
06 = MAX

Level Change

Level Change ( - and 1 and 2 Button ) [ZiT]
288A9FC2 ECFF1300
050709BC 000000xx
E0000000 80008000
xx = Level
28 = Easy
04 = Normal
10 = Difficult
1C = Ultimateness
C4 = Super Ultimateness
